description:
Maka and Soul’s trip to Italy turns ugly when they run into Crona and Ragnarok, a Meister and Weapon team that shares a highly unusual bond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black-Blooded Terror: There`s a Weapon Inside Crona?
Il sangue nero del terrore. C`è un`arma dentro Chrona?
Kokketsu no Kyoufu: Crona no Naka ni Buki ga Iru?
Le sang noir de la terreur. Il y a une arme dans Crona ?
黒血の恐怖 ~クロナの中に武器がいる?~
